scripts.developerBeforeBuild: path-exists DeveloperBeforeBuild.ps1 && ( @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./DeveloperBeforeBuild.ps1 ) || ( echo 'DeveloperBeforeBuild.ps1 not found' )
scripts.developerAfterBuild: path-exists DeveloperAfterBuild.ps1 && ( @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./DeveloperAfterBuild.ps1 ) || ( echo 'DeveloperAfterBuild.ps1 not found' )
scripts.developerClean: path-exists DeveloperClean.ps1 && ( @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./DeveloperClean.ps1 ) || ( echo 'DeveloperClean.ps1 not found' )
scripts.developerProjectOpened: path-exists DeveloperProjectOpened.ps1 && ( @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./DeveloperProjectOpened.ps1 ) || ( echo 'DeveloperProjectOpened.ps1 not found' )
